plot: Various missing children cases are dramatically recreated, in hopes that viewers can provide information to assist police and searching families in the active and ongoing search for missing children.
plot_en: Various missing children cases are dramatically recreated, in hopes that viewers can provide information to assist police and searching families in the active and ongoing search for missing children.
plot_es: Various missing children cases are dramatically recreated, in hopes that viewers can provide information to assist police and searching families in the active and ongoing search for missing children.
title: Missing Children
